op_master_id:
(SELECT
    kesn,
    dkei,
    dseq,
    sseq,
    to_date( CAST(dymd as VARCHAR(8)) , 'YYYYMMDD') as dymd,
    dcno,
    RTRIM(rbmn) AS rbmn,
    RTRIM(rtor) AS rtor,
    rkmk,
    RTRIM(reda) AS reda,
    rtky,
    RTRIM(sbmn) AS sbmn,
    RTRIM(stor) AS stor,
    skmk,
    RTRIM(seda) AS seda,
    stky,
    valu,
    fway
FROM
    (SELECT
        h.dymd,
        h.dcno,
        z.*
    FROM zdata_h AS h
    JOIN zdata AS z ON
        h.kesn = z.kesn AND
        h.dseq = z.dseq AND
        h.dkei = z.dkei
    WHERE
        (h.dymd BETWEEN :DYMD_START AND :DYMD_END) AND
        z.delf = 0
    ) AS t
)
